what: Query APIs that use the open311 standard
title: Query APIs that use the open311 standard
text: open311 R package allows query endpoint uses open311 API standard public service communication. Usually, APIs established alongside web services allow citizens submit public service tickets public spaces. tickets can retrieved using open311 APIs. open311 supports official endpoints currently include services requests.

title: Query APIs that use the open311 standard
text: can install development version open311 GitHub :

title: Query APIs that use the open311 standard
text: following example loads open311, sets jurisdiction retrieves small amount data service tickets Cologne, Germany.
code: library(open311)  o311_jurisdiction("Cologne") #> $root #> [1] "https://sags-uns.stadt-koeln.de/georeport/v2/" #>  #> $name #> [1] "Köln / Cologne, Deutschland" #>  #> $country #> [1] "DEU" #>  #> $discovery #> [1] "https://sags-uns.stadt-koeln.de/georeport/v2/discovery.json" #>  #> $version #> [1] "georeport-v2" #>  #> $jurisdiction #> [1] "stadt-koeln.de" o311_requests() #> # A tibble: 100 × 13 #>    service_request_id title  description   lat  long address_string service_name #>    <chr>              <chr>  <chr>       <dbl> <dbl> <chr>          <chr>        #>  1 862-2023           #862-… "Kreuzung …  50.9  6.92 50931 Köln - … Gully verst… #>  2 863-2023           #863-…  <NA>        50.9  6.97 50968 Köln - … Leuchtmitte… #>  3 864-2023           #864-… "Led Lampe…  51.0  6.91 50827 Köln - … Leuchtmitte… #>  4 865-2023           #865-… "Die Ampel…  51.0  6.91 50825 Köln - … Kfz-Ampel d… #>  5 866-2023           #866-… "Auf Höhe …  50.9  7.00 51149 Köln - … Wilder Müll  #>  6 867-2023           #867-… "Auf Höhe …  50.9  7.00 51149 Köln - … Wilder Müll  #>  7 868-2023           #868-… "Erheblich…  51.0  6.98 50735 Köln - … Defekte Obe… #>  8 869-2023           #869-… "Erheblich…  51.0  6.98 50735 Köln - … Defekte Obe… #>  9 870-2023           #870-… "Auf der I…  51.0  6.95 50735 Köln - … Defekte Obe… #> 10 871-2023           #871-… "Straße mi…  50.9  6.92 50931 Köln - … Gully verst… #> # ℹ 90 more rows #> # ℹ 6 more variables: requested_datetime <chr>, updated_datetime <chr>, #> #   status <chr>, media_url <chr>, status_note <chr>, service_code <chr>

what: Query the current status of multiple requests — o311_requests
title: Query the current status of multiple requests — o311_requests
Query the current status of multiple requests — o311_requests
code: o311_requests(   jurisdiction_id = NULL,   service_code = NULL,   start_date = NULL,   end_date = NULL,   status = NULL,   ... )

title: Query the current status of multiple requests — o311_requests
text: jurisdiction_id ID specific jurisdiction. required endpoint serves multiple jurisdictions. service_code [character] IDs service types queried. Defaults available codes endpoint. list available service codes can retrieved using o311_services. start_date, end_date [POSIXct] Start date end date query results. Must date-time objects. specified, defaults last 90 days. status [character] Status public service ticket. Can one "open" "closed". NULL, returns types tickets. ... endpoint-specific parameters documented respective endpoint reference.
